Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CRP-AC1  (caerin-related peptide A. callidryas 1; UCLL1; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretion, the red-eyed tree frog,Agalychnis callidryas, North America, Central America, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (66.67%) tofrog DRP-AA-3-4GRAVY: -0.496; Mol Wt: 5050.767; Mol formula: C205H324N68O65S8; Mol ex coeff: 1990.Activity: Active against E. coli and M. luteus (zone inhibition, stronger than cecropin B).
Literature Information.Author: Wang L, Zhou M, McClelland A, Reilly A, Chen T, Gagliardo R, Walker B, Shaw C. 2008
Literature Information.Title: Novel dermaseptin, adenoregulin and caerin homologs from the Central American red-eyed leaf frog, Agalychnis callidryas, revealed by functional peptidomics of defensive skin secretion.
